description: This file defines a SchemaLoader class responsible for loading and caching an OpenAPI schema from a URL or local file, with fallback mechanisms and schema persistence.

classes.name: SchemaLoader
classes.description: A class that loads, caches, and provides information about an OpenAPI schema from various sources with fallback logic.

methods.name: __init__(self, url: Optional[str], local_path: str, session: Optional[requests.Session] = None)
methods.description: Initializes the SchemaLoader with optional URL, local path, and requests session.

methods.name: Dict[str,Any] load_schema(self)
methods.description: Loads the schema prioritizing local file, then URL, then fallback to local bundled file. Caches the schema and source info.

methods.name: Dict[str,Any] get_schema(self)
methods.description: Returns the current schema, loading it if not already loaded.

methods.name: Dict[str,Any] reload(self)
methods.description: Forces reloading of the schema, allowing for dynamic updates.

methods.name: str source_info(self)
methods.description: Returns a string describing where the schema was loaded from (file, URL, or empty).

ctags.name: __init__
ctags.pattern: /^    def __init__(self, url: Optional[str], local_path: str, session: Optional[requests.Session] /
ctags.signature: (self, url: Optional[str], local_path: str, session: Optional[requests.Session] = None)
